org.openntf.xworlds.appservers.webapp.config
Interface XWorldsApplicationConfigurator

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseXWorldsApplicationConfigurator, DefaultXWorldsApplicationConfig
public interface XWorldsApplicationConfigurator

Since:
1.0.0 Interface for managing interaction with the current ServletContext
Author:
Daniele Vistalli

Field Summary
static java.lang.String APPCONTEXT_ATTRS_CWAPPCONFIG
          This constant is the name of the ServletContext attribute holding the application configuration.
static java.lang.String CONTEXTPARAM_CWAPPCONFIG_CLASS
          This constant is the name of the ServletContext attribute holding the application configuration.
static java.lang.String CONTEXTPARAM_CWAPPSIGNER_IDENTITY
          The notes full name for the identity to be used when a "SIGNER" session is required.
static java.lang.String CONTEXTPARAM_CWDEFAULTDEVELOPER_IDENTITY
          The notes full name for the identity to be used when a "SIGNER" session is required.
 
Method Summary
 XWorldsApplicationConfiguration build()
          Registers the implementation of this class to the current ServletContext, using APPCONTEXT_ATTRS_CWAPPCONFIG
 void configure(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
          Configures the configuration for the current application, based on server settings and application settings (managed via the javax.servlet.ServletContext
 void setupRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
          This initialises the ODA Factory sessions based on authentication and sets Domino full name
